North_Miami.Aventura Mall: The Aventura Mall is a super-regional shopping mall in Aventura, Florida, a northern suburb of Miami. It is the largest conventional shopping mall in Florida, having a gross leasable area of 2,700,000 square feet (250,000 m2), and is the second largest shopping center in the United States. The mall has three floors of retail space, comprising more than 300 retailers.
